instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1)+inm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'd', rd_name);

instructions.name: lw
instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1)+inm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'w', rd_name);

instructions.name: lhu
lwu
lbu
addw
instructions.definition: const temp = (BigInt(rs1) + BigInt(rs2)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp;

instructions.name: subw
instructions.definition: const temp = (BigInt(rs1) + BigInt(rs2)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp;

instructions.name: addiw
instructions.definition: const temp = ((BigInt(rs1) & 0xFFFFFFFFn) + BigInt(inm)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp;

instructions.name: slliw
instructions.definition: if (shamt > 0) {const temp = ((BigInt(rs1) & 0xFFFFFFFFn) << BigInt(shamt)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp; rd = capi_int2uint(rd);}

instructions.name: srliw
instructions.definition: if (shamt > 0) {const temp = ((BigInt(rs1) & 0xFFFFFFFFn) >> BigInt(shamt)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp; rd = capi_int2uint(rd);}

instructions.name: sllw
instructions.definition: const temp = ((BigInt(rs1) & 0xFFFFFFFFn) << BigInt(rs2)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp; rd = capi_int2uint(rd);

instructions.name: srlw
instructions.definition: const temp = ((BigInt(rs1) & 0xFFFFFFFFn) >> BigInt(rs2)) & 0xFFFFFFFFn; rd = temp & 0x80000000n ? temp | 0xFFFFFFFF00000000n : temp; rd = capi_int2uint(rd);
